column5: Hi all,  Anyone in Sault Ste. Marie interested in getting out tomorrow afternoon/evening?  I'll be in town on business and I'm looking to try some local waters.  I packed my fly rod and my spinning rod so either will work for me.   I'll buy the coffees and can provide the ride.
Hey chum...I can't say that I can make it out, but if you're looking for somewhere to wet a line I might be able to point you in the right direction at least.  PM me if you're interested.
